channel.title: I need a girlfriend
channel.description: Yes, ik what most of you are thinking; lostmyphat never needs help with tha babes! But you see, this is not true. I haven't been able to date until this year, 9th, and I haven't asked anybody out. My brother has only dated one girl, but all the girls go to him. I have quite a few friends that are girls, but none of them I would really go out with. Any ideas?

item.title: I need a girlfriend
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Nobody here knows you in real life… what kind of topic is this -.-

You can pull a reyx7 when you have an idea and ask for help I guess though…

Read full topic

item.title: I need a girlfriend
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

lostmyphat:

Yes, ik what most of you are thinking; lostmyphat never needs help with tha babes! But you see, this is not true. I haven’t been able to date until this year, 9th, and I haven’t asked anybody out. My brother has only dated one girl, but all the girls go to him. I have quite a few friends that are girls, but none of them I would really go out with. Any ideas?

Stop being beta. Date who you want, when you want.
